articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae Inspects Kumsong Tractor Factory
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae Inspects Kumsong Tractor Factory
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, made a field survey of the Kumsong Tractor Factory. 
					 Choe Ryong Hae went round various places of the factory and gave pep-talks to the workers striving to hit their production goal.
					
					 He stressed the need for the young employees to take the lead in production in the spirit of self-reliance and self-development like the creators of the Spirit of Kangwon Province.

articles.title: Congratulations to FM of Brazil
articles.content:
Congratulations to FM of Brazil
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho Saturday sent a congratulatory message to Aloysio Nunes Ferreira upon his appointment as foreign minister of Brazil.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would steadily grow stronger in the future and wished him success in his new job.

articles.title: Delegation of Ministry of Interior of Russia Leaves
articles.content:
Delegation of Ministry of Interior of Russia Leaves
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the General Bureau of Emigration Affairs of the Ministry of Interior of the Russian Federation led by Deputy General Director Dmitri Demidenko left here on Saturday.

articles.title: Ryomyong Street, Model of Juche-oriented Architecture
articles.content:
Ryomyong Street, Model of Juche-oriented Architecture
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Ryomyong Street now under construction with self-reliance and self-development as the dynamic force is nearing completion in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK.
					 The street will show the high level of socialist civilization as it takes its shape as a model of Juche-oriented architecture, an ideal one.
					
					 Tree- and turf-planting is being pushed forward at the final stage in the street to cover 250,000 square meters of land.
					
					 The grassed area reaches 150,000 square meters and more than 30,000 trees of over 50 species were planted.
					
					 Applied to the construction of the street are energy-saving and green architectural technologies and products like geothermal ventilation, geothermal underfloor-heating, geothermal air-conditioning, anion-generating synthetic wallpaper and paints and hydroponics.
					
					 And a project for decorating apartment houses and welfare facilities with lamplights is going on.
					
					 When giving field guidance to the construction site of the street few days ago, respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un ardently called upon all the builders to strikingly demonstrate the invincible national power of socialist Korea by successfully building the street as a monumental edifice in the era of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Energy-saving Technologies Introduced
articles.content:
Energy-saving Technologies Introduced
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- The Chollima Steel Complex in the DPRK lowers the production cost of steel per ton by introducing energy-saving methods.
					 The steel output was increased year-on-year this year, but the production cost declined in the complex. In case of its steel shop, the power consumption was decreased 10 percent.
					
					 Officials and employees of the complex have made all their efforts to boost the production with lower cost by applying advanced technologies. As part of their efforts, many plans for technical innovation were developed to be conducive to minimizing heat loss at electric furnace and maximizing the turn-out of molten iron.
					
					 Particularly, the enlarged interior capacity of electric furnace makes it possible to produce several more tons of molten iron and a heating device based on pulverized coal was applied to the process of preheating steel-teeming ladle.

articles.title: U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Is Bound to Go Bust: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Is Bound to Go Bust: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- These days the new U.S. administration was reported to be comprehensively examining its DPRK policy options.
					 Its purpose is to examine various proposals in political, military, diplomatic and economic and other fields and thus seek an effective way of halting the DPRK's development of nuclear weapons and missiles.
					
					 What matters is that its options include extremely reckless and dangerous ones such as use of its military force including a preemptive strike at the DPRK, multi-faceted military and diplomatic pressure upon it, harsh economic sanctions, scenario to bring down its system and redeployment of tactical nuclear weapons in south Korea.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says that the U.S. administration is examining all policy options which had been thrown into a dustbin, a clear proof of the great agony it has suffered repeated shame and setbacks in the confrontation with the DPRK and an indication of the fate of the American Empire going to its final ruin.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The new U.S. administration should bear in mind truth that Songun Korea is sure to emerge victorious while the U.S. is fated to suffer a defeat in the history of standoff between the two. 
					
					 Whatever policy option the U.S. may take towards the DPRK, it will be accompanied by the latter's tailored counteraction of its style and in that case regret will come too late.
					
					 The U.S. administration would be well advised to recollect the epigram "sinister purpose ends in poor result".

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Group for Their "Human Rights" Campaign against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Group for Their "Human Rights" Campaign against DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- At the 34th Session of the UN Human Rights Council, the south Korean puppet group staged such farce in cooperation with their masters U.S. and Japan as  prodding despicable human scum into making "testimonies" on the "human rights situation in the north" as part of their anti-DPRK smear campaign based on lies and fabrications. They begged for ratcheting up international sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK over "human rights" issue.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article terms this a hysteric fit of those taken aback by ever louder shouts of hurrah for the Workers' Party and socialism made by all service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The issue of human rights has never existed and there cannot be such a thing under the socialist system of the DPRK centered on the popular masses.
					
					 This being a hard reality, the south Korean puppet group are working hard to carry out their scenario to stifle the DPRK in collusion with outside forces, while making malignant mud-slinging at it. This is an unpardonable mockery of justice and truth and an unbearable insult to inviolable human rights.
					
					 The puppet forces are the human rights abusers who put south Korea under fascist dictatorship.
					
					 These human rights abusers are imploring their masters U.S. and Japan for sanctions and pressure upon the compatriots in the north, ballyhooing about "human rights in the north," while shelving their crimes. This is the height of shamelessness. 
					
					 No matter what rhetoric the group of traitors may let out to mislead the public opinion, they can neither tarnish the image of the most advantageous Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses in the world nor escape their dirty fate of going to ruin.

articles.title: DPRK's Papers Slam Park Geun Hye's Last-ditch Efforts
articles.content:
DPRK's Papers Slam Park Geun Hye's Last-ditch Efforts
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers here Saturday in commentaries denounce Park Geun Hye for making last-ditch efforts after facing a severe judgment by the people as she is encouraging the conservative gangsters to go on rampage, taking a non-compliance approach towards the decision on her impeachment.
					 Rodong Sinmun says:
					
					 The ruling on the impeachment of traitor Park Geun Hye amounts to a vehement condemnation and severe judgment by history and people of all crimes she committed by pursuing sycophancy and treachery, confrontation with the compatriots in the north, anti-social and fascist rule, corruption and irregularities.
					
					 Such thrice-cursed quisling is still going busy with the bid to rally right-wing conservative forces, not crestfallen, challenging the public mind-set. Her demeanor is besmirching the confused political landscape in south Korea.
					
					 This reminds one of a viper which spouts out poison till it is breathing its last, sparking off bitterer anger among people from all walks of life in south Korea.
					
					 If the truth is fully probed as she asserted, she is bound to meet a more miserable fate. This notwithstanding, foolish Park is recklessly provoking the people by going stiff-necked.
					
					 Not the slightest leniency should be shown for such bete noire and despicable rogue like Park Geun Hye and only merciless punishment should be meted out to her.
					
					 Minju Joson says that the traitor is running the whole gamut of dirty and sinister sleight of hand to prolong her remaining days after being removed from office, but this would bring her to a more miserable end.

articles.title: DPRK Will Retaliate against Those Who Infringe upon Its Sovereignty and Dignity: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
DPRK Will Retaliate against Those Who Infringe upon Its Sovereignty and Dignity: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises now under way in south Korea on full-scale bring to bolder relief the U.S. aggressive and criminal nature.
					 As part of this joint muscle flexing the U.S. recently staged the largest-ever war rehearsal aimed at making preparations for "infiltration into Pyongyang" and "beheading operation" and operation to disable the DPRK's military command mechanism with the U.S. Special Operation Force including the ill-famed elite terror units such as Seals, Green Berets and Delta Force involved.
					
					 Meanwhile, it conducted a joint marine maneuver of the carrier flotilla comprised of an escort craft of the Japan Maritime Self-defense Force, the U.S. nuclear carrier Carl Vinson, destroyers and supply craft under the pretext of coping with someone's "provocations," independent of the above-said joint military exercises.
					
					 This is the escalation of the U.S. moves for a nuclear war to stifle the DPRK which is making a dynamic advance along the road of independence against imperialism at any cost and a clear manifestation of its hostile moves against the latter.
					
					 The U.S. is confirming the feasibility of an actual war including the "beheading operation" against the headquarters of the Korean revolution and operation for a preemptive strike at the DPRK's nuclear strike means through the on-going joint saber-rattling.
					
					 It put into practice "OPLAN 5015", the new wartime allied operation plan with its main emphasis on a preemptive strike at the DPRK's important nuclear facilities. From March 10, it secretly deployed the nuclear  carrier strike group composed of nuclear-powered carrier Carl Vinson, guided-missile cruiser Lake Champlain, Aegis destroyers Michael Murphy and Wayne E. Meyer in the East Sea of Korea before staging the drill for launching a sudden strike at the area of the DPRK's side.
					
					 On March 15, it staged the drill for dropping nuclear bombs over the DPRK's major targets for about one hour by letting a formation of B1-B nuclear strategic bombers take off at the Anderson Air Force Base on Guam and fly over the Sangdong Firing Ground of south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. hell-bent on the dangerous saber-rattling in south Korea little short of a nuclear arsenal is the arch criminal harassing peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia.
					
					 It is a daydream for the U.S. to stifle the DPRK, a full-fledged nuclear weapons state. Its moves only precipitate its final ruin.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to bear in mind that the army of the DPRK has shifted the mode of its military counteraction to that of preemptive strike to cope with the former's moves for a nuclear war.
					
					 All strategic assets of the hostile forces including the above-said nuclear carrier flotilla involved in the on-going maneuvers are in sight of the Korean People's Army's powerful ultra-precision strike means.
					
					 Once even a single shell is fired into the inviolable territory, waters and sky where the sovereignty of the DPRK is exercised, its Juche-oriented weapons will reduce the bases of aggression and provocation to such debris that no living thing can be found. This is not hot air.
					
					 No mercy will be shown for those who infringe upon the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK even a bit.

articles.title: S. Korea: Terming Teachers Union Lawless Declared Null
articles.content:
S. Korea: Terming Teachers Union Lawless Declared Null
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- The Teachers Union of south Korea (Jongyojo) staged an over-night sit-in outside the building of the puppet government in Seoul and the "National Assembly" in Youido on Mar. 15 and 16 to demand the nullification of terming the union lawless and reinstatement of its former cadres, according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of People.
					 Jongyojo urged the authorities to reinstate 33 former trade union cadres who were dismissed last year and allow application for reinstating 37 this year.
					
					 It held a press conference on Mar. 15 in front of the Supreme Court and demanded rapid handling of the suit on nullifying the notice on outlawing the union.

articles.title: Japan Accused of Pressing for Removal of Statue of Girl Sexual Slave
articles.content:
Japan Accused of Pressing for Removal of Statue of Girl Sexual Slave
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Organizations of south Korea, including the Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps and the Federation of Women's Organizations, released a statement on March 16 in denunciation of Japan's moves to press for the removal of the statue of girl sexual slave for the Imperial Japanese Army which was erected in Germany, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Tongil News.
					 The statement demanded that the Japanese government immediately stop its attack and obstruction of the erection of the statue of girl sexual slave and apologize and fulfill its responsibility as a war criminal state.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Japan's above-said moves are an intolerable violence of the assailant and criminal act in the German society which has fulfilled its responsibilities after apologizing for the crimes committed by the Nazis. 
					
					 This is a threat to peace and a shameless political operation.

articles.title: Struggle against THAAD Deployment Waged in Kyonggi Province of S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle against THAAD Deployment Waged in Kyonggi Province of S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- The Action for Checking THAAD Deployment and the Phyongthaek Citizens' Action against THAAD and for Banishing Anthrax Germs in south Korea called a press conference outside the Osan U.S. air-force base in Phyongthaek City, Kyonggi Province on Thursday to protest against the moves of the U.S. and the puppet military for the deployment of THAAD, according to south Korea's Yonhap News.
					 Speakers at the conference stressed that THAAD is harmful as it poses threat to peace and stability in the Korean peninsula and Northeast Asia and gives a serious effect on the south Korean economy.
					
					 They urged the U.S. and south Korean authorities to stop the deployment of THAAD and immediately withdraw the equipment introduced.
					
					 The organizations waged a demonstration, shouting slogans opposing the deployment of THAAD.

articles.title: Seminars on Works Held in Switzerland, Spain
articles.content:
Seminars on Works Held in Switzerland, Spain
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Seminars on "Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation" and "Making Selfless, Devoted Efforts for the Good of the People Is the Mode of Existence and Source of Invincible Might of the Workers' Party of Korea", works of leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, were held in Switzerland and Spain on Mar. 11 and 13.
					 Present there were members of the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Madrid Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Spain.
					
					 Martin Lotscher, chief of the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, elaborated on the exploits of President Kim Il Sung for national reunification, clarified by Kim Jong Il in his work.
					
					 He said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's work is of greater significance under the present situation in which the moves of the separatists at home and abroad to block the movement for national reunification of the Korean nation are growing ever more vicious.
					
					 We are convinced that the Korean people will surely achieve the cause of reunification under the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un, who is creditably realizing the great leaders' behests for national reunification.
					
					 Miguel Vivanco, chief of the Madrid Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Spain, and other speakers said that while studying the work of Kim Jong Un they came to know better the noble political idea of the Workers' Party of Korea on putting the popular masses above all, and the true picture of the Korean society which achieved the single-minded unity of the leader, the Party and the masses.
					
					 The victory will always be in store for Juche Korea under the distinguished leadership of Kim Jong Un, they stressed.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Germany
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Germany
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed in Berlin on Mar. 9.
					 The chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set the celebration period from Mar. 9 to April 15 and decided to give wide publicity to the career and revolutionary exploits of the President and organize colorful political and cultural events including a seminar, book and photo exhibition and film show during the period.

articles.title: DPRK Is Capable Enough to Counter Pressure: Russian Online Paper
articles.content:
DPRK Is Capable Enough to Counter Pressure: Russian Online Paper
 Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- The Russian online paper Sputnik in a recent article commented on the test-fire of the ground to ground medium to long-range strategic ballistic rocket Pukguksong-2, the Korean-style new strategic weapon system.
					 It recalled that the DPRK succeeded in the test-fire of the above-said rocket on Feb. 12, adding:
					
					 The recent test-fire showed very interesting points in various aspects.
					
					 First of all, the U.S. and its allies never predicted the test-fire.
					
					 It is evidenced by the fact that experts of the U.S., Japan and south Korea expressed divergent opinions on the test-fire.
					
					 Next, Pukguksong-2 is quite different from the missile system which the north Korean army has in place.
					
					 A missile mounted on heavy caterpillar vehicle was launched without any preparations in the launching site. It moved to the launching position a few minutes before it was fired, giving U.S. spy satellites no chance to detect it.
					
					 An analysis of the video footage of the test- fire shows that the launching pad had a defence system to counter the enemy attack.
					
					 Judging from this, the north Korean army can launch missiles from any site, giving relatively little time to counter them. It has become more difficult to detect or analyze them. 
					
					 A missile using high-thrust solid-fuel engine is capable of disabling a missile defence system of the enemy through a single strike in a short distance flight.
					
					 The tension on the Korean peninsula should not be escalated any longer.
					
					 There are public opinions in the international community that the strategic status of the DPRK should be recognized, the paper noted, and went on: 
					
					 It is quite natural that pressure through sanctions can never work on a country which can develop an advanced missile system in a short span of time. 
					
					 The recent test-fire goes to prove that the DPRK has enough capability to counter the pressure on it.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae recorre el Combinado de Tractores Kum Song
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae recorre el Combinado de Tractores Kum Song
Pyongyang, 18 de marzo (ACNC) -- Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y del CC del PTC, visito el Combinado de Tractores Kum Song enfrascado en la campana para producir el tractor de nuevo modelo.
					Pasando revista a varios talleres, el estimulo a los obreros del combinado quienes trabajan con abnegacion para cumplir con adelanto la tarea asumida.
					
					En la reunion de consulta sesionada en el terreno, se discutieron los problemas para hacer a los jovenes abrir la ruta de avance levantando al frente la oleada de emulacion socialista y aplicando las ciencias y tecnologias avanzadas.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena al fracaso la politica hostil de EE.UU. contra la RPDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena al fracaso la politica hostil de EE.UU. contra la RPDC
Pyongyang, 18 de marzo (ACNC) -- Dicen que en estos dias, la nueva administracion norteamericana esta revisando globalmente los proyectos de la politica sobre la RPDC. Es decir, estan buscando el remedio eficiente para lograr el cese del desarrollo de armas nucleares y misiles de la RPDC al examinar los proyectos en todas las esferas, incluyendo la politica, los asuntos militares, la diplomacia y la economia.
					 El problema es que en esos proyectos estan incluidas las opciones muy aventureras y peligrosas como el uso de fuerzas armadas que incluye el ataque preventivo, el recrudecimiento de la presion multilateral en el plano militar y el diplomatico, la sancion economica intensa, el derrocamiento del regimen, la reubicacion de armas nucleares tacticas en el Sur de Corea, etc.
					
					 El hecho de que la administracion estadounidense vuelve a examinar todos los proyectos de la politica sobre la RPDC, que habian sido echados al basurero, comprueba la angustia de EE.UU., que sufrio repetidamente la verguenza y la derrota en el enfrentamiento con la RPDC, y anuncia la destruccion final del imperio americano.
					
					 Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este sabado y prosigue:
					
					 La nueva administracion norteamericana debe aprender la verdad de que la Corea del Songun siempre gana en el enfrentamiento con EE.UU.
					
					 A cualquier opcion que tome EE.UU., la RPDC le respondera con la contramedida adecuada. Si sucede esto, EE.UU. se arrepentiria tarde de su error.
					
					 La administracion estadounidense debe tener presente este proverbio: "A las malas jugadas, malas paradas".

articles.title: Periodicos critican actitud desobediente de Park Geun-hye a la sentencia de dimision
articles.content:
Periodicos critican actitud desobediente de Park Geun-hye a la sentencia de dimision
Pyongyang, 18 de marzo (ACNC) -- Los principales periodicos coreanos publicaron este sabado sendos comentarios individuales denunciando a Park Geun-hye que asume la actitud desobediente a la decision de la corte sobre su dimision instigando el tumulto de los gangsteres conservadores. 
					La sentencia de destitucion de la traidora Park significa el castigo severo de la historia y la poblacion surcoreana por sus crimenes vendepatrias, actos de enfrentamiento fratricida, politicas antipopulares, dominacion fascista y practicas de irregularidades y corrupcion, revela el diario Rodong Sinmun y continua:
					
					En desafio a la opinion publica, la criminal de peor calana se porta todavia con altaneria y ensucia la ya caotica situacion politica del Sur de Corea agrupando las fuerzas conservadoras y derechistas, hecho que pone mas indignados a los surcoreanos de diferentes sectores. 
					
					Si se esclarece completamente la verdad como dice Park, ella sufrira el destino mas tragico que ahora. 
					
					Sin embargo, la estupida desafia inutilmente al pueblo con sus absurdas insistencias. 
					
					Hay que castigar implacablemente a las escorias humanas tan cinicas y malvadas como Park. 
					
					Minju Joson tambien advierte que sufrira el fin mas tragico la traidora Park Geun-hye que para mantener su vida, recurre a todos los trucos baratos y sucios desobedeciendo a la sentencia de su destitucion.

articles.title: Fuerzas hostiles estan al alcance de ataque de potencia nuclear: comentario de ACNC
articles.content:
Fuerzas hostiles estan al alcance de ataque de potencia nuclear: comentario de ACNC
Pyongyang, 18 de marzo (ACNC) -- A medida que se tornan intensos en la Peninsula Coreana los ejercicios militares conjuntos Key Resolve y Foal Eagle, se hace cada dia mas evidente el intento agresivo y criminal de EE.UU.
					En el marco de los simulacros, EE.UU. ejercito la operacion militar de gran dimension para la "infiltracion en Pyongyang", el "descabezamiento" y la paralizacion del aparato de mando militar de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Se incorporaron en ella hasta las tropas especiales norteamericanas como Seals, Boinas Verdes y Deltas.
					
					Aparte de Key Resolve y Foal Eagle, tuvo lugar, bajo el pretexto de enfrentarse a la "provocacion" de alguien, el entrenamiento naval conjunto de la flotilla compuesta por los barcos escolta de las "Fuerzas Maritimas de Autodefensa" de Japon y el portaaviones nuclear Carl Vinson, los destructores, buques de abastecimiento de EE.UU., etc.
					
					Tales movimientos dejan conocer el intento agresivo y hostil de atropellar a toda costa a la RPDC que avanza a pasos firmes por la senda de independencia antiimperialista.
					
					Esta vez, EE.UU. esta confirmando la posibilidad real de la "operacion de descabezamiento" contra la Direccion de la Revolucion Coreana y la otra de ataque preventivo contra los medios de ataque nuclear de la RPDC.
					
					Tras poner en practica el "OPLAN 5015" que persigue el objetivo principal de dar ataque preventivo a las importantes instalaciones nucleares de la RPDC, el imperio libra desde el 10 de marzo el ejercicio de asalto contra la RPDC con el portaaviones nuclear Carl Vinson, el crucero con proyectiles teledirigidos Lake Champlain y los destructores Aegis como Michael Murphy y Wayne E. Meyer, trasladados sigilosamente al Mar Este de Corea.
					
					El dia 15, introdujo en secreto en el Sur de Corea una escuadra de B-1B proveniente de la base aerea Anderson en la isla Guam que realizo casi una hora en el cielo sobre el campo de tiro de Sangdong el ejercicio de lanzamiento de bombas nucleares contra los objetivos principales de la RPDC.
					
					EE.UU. es el culpable de agravacion de la situacion que destruye la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del Nordeste Asiatico.
					
					Es una ilusion vana y opcion suicida el intento del imperio de aplastar a la RPDC que ha ocupado la posicion de digna potencia nuclear.
					
					EE.UU. no debe olvidar ni un momento que el modo de reaccion militar del Ejercito Popular de Corea paso al de ataque preventivo frente a la campana norteamericana de guerra nuclear.
					
					Ahora, el portaaviones nuclear y otras propiedades estrategicas de las fuerzas hostiles se encuentran en la mira de los medios de ataque superprecisos del EPC.
					
					Si los enemigos envian un solo obus hacia la tierra, el mar y el aire jurisdiccionales de la RPDC, las armas del Juche de esta devastaran todos los bastiones de agresion y provocacion. Esto no es una advertencia huera.
					
					No deben esperar la piedad los que intenten ofender, aunque en lo minimo, nuestra soberania y dignidad.
